title: Harnessing AI for Financial Stability: IMF and BIS Lead the Supervisory Revolution
description: The IMF and BIS working paper outlines how financial regulators can harness artificial intelligence to strengthen oversight, improve risk detection, and modernize supervision through ethical, transparent, and data-driven frameworks. It urges global cooperation to prevent a digital divide in regulation and to ensure AI enhances, not replaces human judgment.
content: The IMF Working Paper authored by Parma Bains, Gabriela Conde, Rangachary Ravikumar, and Ebru Sonbul Iskender from the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the Bank for International Settlements (BIS), lays out a compelling vision for how artificial... [5937 chars]

title: Fund managers warn of market volatility amid AI exuberance
description: Major investors are increasingly sacrificing the wild gains promised in artificial intelligence and defence amid fears they’ll get caught in a violent reversal.
content:
Some of the country’s top fund managers are warning investors to brace for volatile returns as they slash exposure to the hottest pockets of the sharemarket amid concerns a bubble in technology stocks is about to burst.

title: Deloitte’s botched AI report is now a headache for the big four
description: The federal government under pressure to require all consultants to disclose when they use artificial intelligence in their work.

title: 60 percent of Indian colleges now allow students to use AI tools: Report
description: Artificial Intelligence is rapidly transforming India’s higher education landscape, with colleges increasingly adopting AI tools for teaching, learning, and administration. A new EY–FICCI report reveals that over 60% of higher education institutions now allow students to use AI tools, signalling a major shift toward tech-driven campuses.
content: A growing number of Indian higher education institutions (HEIs) are embracing artificial intelligence in classrooms, both for teaching and learning. According to a new report by Ernst & Young-Parthenon in collaboration with FICCI, over 60 percent of ... [3331 chars]

title: Bernice King and Zelda Williams ask to stop AI videos
description: Bernice King, daughter of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., has voiced her support for Zelda Williams’ condemnation of AI-generated videos made with OpenAI’s Sora 2. Both women criticised the unethical use of artificial intelligence to recreate deceased public figures, calling for respect and accountability in digital media.
content:
Nillohit Bagchi | Oct 08, 2025, 10:19 IST

title: New 'Caira' Camera Brings Real-Time AI Editing Power: 'Nano Banana Embedded Like A Filter'
description: A new device is here to turn artificial intelligence-based image editing into something instant. A startup called Camera Intelligence has launched a device called Caira, which connects to your iPhone using MagSafe. It uses interchangeable lenses and takes photos through your phone's camera.
